verses.name: Psalms 38:7
verses.text: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.

verses.name: Psalms 38:8
verses.text: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.

verses.name: Psalms 38:9
verses.text: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

verses.name: Psalms 38:10
verses.text: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.

verses.name: Psalms 38:11
verses.text: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.
